title: Get a personalised career recommendation and plan

schema.description: In this questionnaire, we'll ask you about your current situation, have you self assess your skills and capabilities, and ask you about your interests and preferences.
In this questionnaire, we'll ask you about your current situation, have you self-assess your procurement skills and capabilities.

title: Do you currently work for NSW Government?
Do you currently work in a procurement role, or similar?

schema.help: If you're currently in a procurement and contracting role (or a similar role), we'll ask questions about your technical skills to help us recommend roles.
schema.helpExtra: Procurement roles can include disciplines such as strategic sourcing, category management, contract management, analysis, advice, policy and governance. Similar roles may include those in project, policy, administrative, finance, commercial and other related disciplines.

title: Do you have a specific role in mind that you’d like to move into?

schema.help: If you have a specific role or pathway in mind, let’s explore how you can get there.

title: Select which job title closely matches your current role.

schema.help: We’ll use this as a starting point and does not have to be an exact match.
support: This tool includes common types of procurement roles, and similar related roles, that can be found in the NSW public sector.
However, role titles may be different for each NSW public sector organisation.

title: Select your current or most similar role?

schema.help: As a starting point, we will explore your skills and capabilities based on your current role.

title: What role do you want to move into?

schema.help: We can explore how you might move into this role.

schema.description: In this section, you'll assess yourself on the skills required for your current role. If you are not currently in a procurement role you will assess some entry level skills.
In this section, you'll assess yourself on the capabilities required for your current role. If you are not currently in a procurement role you will assess some general capabilities.

title: Your personalised career pathway is ready!

schema.description: Thank you for answering this questionnaire, click next to view your results.
